input.sentences: the highschool graduates were so ready to be out of school .
the basketball cheerleader posed in the net .
the stack of books was finally seeing its last day of school .
even the football players rejoiced on the last day .
graduation was here and everyone was thinking about their futures .
output.sentences: It was a different time for highschoolers in the 50s and 60s
Cheerleaders were known to perform crazy stunts
They studied hard with the books their schools provided them
Football was a huge deal in high school
The students were always happy to graduate
